Airbomber: I'm here with Time Warp, come on baby, you know it's me! I'm bla=
ck and white, I change into a cheetah, well I used to, but I like my robot =
mode, and I got inhaled by that guy, remember?...
  ----- Original Message =
----- 
  From: *Orchid* 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, Marc=
h 18, 2001 3:50 AM
  Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


  Armada



  Arma=
da: Airbomber? How can I be sure that's you?


  (Armada awaits an answer.)=

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Soulstice Omega 
    To: nbwrp=
g@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:32 AM
    Subject: Re=
: Big Post(with fries)


    Arrow puts Airbomber on.

    Airbomber: Infec=
tra? Is that you really?...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From:=
 *Orchid* 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Sunday, March 18, =
2001 3:24 AM
      Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


      Armada



    =
  Armada: Airbomber? You mean he's not dead!? Uh...Put him on...I guess...
=


      (Armada says back in the commlink to Arrow confused.)

        ----=
- Original Message ----- 
        From: Soulstice Omega 
        To: nbwrpg=
@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:17 AM
        Subj=
ect: Re: Big Post(with fries)


        Arrow: Hera that, Airbomber? She US=
ED to be Infectra!

        Airbomber: You can't fool me, you just got some=
one who sounds just like her to pose as her...LET ME TALK TO HER!

        =
Arrow: Airbomber wants to talk to you, Infectra. I mean, Armada...
        =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: *Orchid* 
          To: nbw=
rpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:10 AM
       =
   Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


          Armada



          (Armad=
a listens to the voice coming over her commlink.)


          Armada: Actua=
lly, no. But that was my original name. I'm Armada now. Who is this?


    =
      (Armada says into the commlink and awaits an answer from Arrow.)

   =
         ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: Soulstice Omega 
 =
           To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Saturday, March 17=
, 2001 10:19 PM
            Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


           =
 Airbomber: But where do we go?

            Arrow: That's up to you, Airbo=
mber, but I wouldn't lie to you.

            Train Wreck: Actually, he WOU=
LD lie to you, but I wouldn't, and I seen this as well.

            Strana=
to: I didn't see it, but I believe it.

            Airbomber: But how can =
that be?

            Arrow: Call her.

            Airbomber: I tried that=
.

            Arrow: You don't keep track of those kind of things? I'll ca=
ll her.

            Arrow calls Armada by commlink.

            Arrow: Is=
 there anyone named Infectra there?...

              ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
              From: Alloran2@... 
              To: nbwrpg@yah=
oogroups.com 
              Sent: Saturday, March 17, 2001 4:56 PM
        =
      Subject: Big Post(with fries)


              OOC: Please add the new=
 Destron base to the events page, Zardus.  Its in 
              Syria. 

 =
             :::Ramjet/Wheeljack/Vulois/Time Warp::: 

              Ramjet=
: The one extremely close to us belongs to the Trainers.  They are led 
   =
           by a bot named Prebon.  They are powerful, and are enemies of th=
e Maximals 
              and Alliance.  The other one is the Blackfortress=
, the base a large faction 
              of Predacons.  There are three Pr=
edacon leaders there, and i think we might 
              be able to work o=
ut an Alliance with them. 
              ~~~~~ 
              Wheeljack: I'=
d say a sloping, hill-type shape.(Thanks for the idea Zardus!) 
           =
   ~~~~~ 
              Vulois: Yes, lets. I think we should first go to th=
e Maximals, for they will 
              be the most likely to cooperate.  =
Even so, there are a lot of warlike 
              Maximals, so be ready fo=
r anything. 
              ::he walks out of his cave and starts flying to =
the CF:: 
              ~~~~~ 
              ::Time Warp was releived that =
they were friends, until he heard what they 
              said about Infec=
tra:: 
              Time Warp: Infectra?! In the Alliance?! I didnt know h=
er very well, but she 
              definately wasnt Alliance material!  L=
ets get out of here Airbomber, these 
              guys are fools.
